question: What causes benign tumors (1 in forearm, one between 3rd & 4th ribs, 2 parathyroid adenomas, 2 thyroid nodules, 1 esophageal nodule, 3 uterine fibroid tumors, 1 growth on base of tongue)?  Is there one radiology test that will diagnosis problems?  Throughout my life, my body continues to produce these tumors/growths.  I have been persistent to get problems checked, but my maternal family history is significant for cancer in ovaries/uterus, lungs, liver/colon, breast, skin, and esophagus.  Paternal family history is significant for kidney stones, diabetes, hypertension, etc.  I also have kidney stones, hypertension, lymphocytic colitis, and considerable abdominal pain.  Any information or assistance would be greatly appreciated.
title: Additional benign tumors
